text: Marian Duś (25 June 1938 – 9 September 2021) was a Polish Roman Catholic Bishop. He was the Auxiliary Bishop of Warsaw from 1986 until 2013. In 2013, he became Auxiliary Bishop Emeritus of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Warsaw.Prokop: Bishops of the Catholic Church in the Third Polish Republic. Krakow: Society of Authors and Publishers of Scientific Works "Universitas", 1998, pp. 34-35. .£Chronicle of the tenth anniversary of the Pontifical Faculty of Theology in Warsaw£. "Warsaw Theological Studies. XIII / 2000. pp. 235. Duś was born in Róża, Poland. Duś died on 9 September 2021 in Warsaw at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops
title: Marian Duś
